definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: The gap is even larger with India, which is also growing fast.
sentences.chinese: 这比值的落差在印度更大，虽然印度也发展迅速。

sentences.english: They have founded that the flood and flood area ratio variation is big according to flood risk analysis.
sentences.chinese: 水灾风险分析中洪灾和涝灾面积比值变化较大。

sentences.english: the curl of a force field measures the torque per unit moment of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 力场的旋度是，描述扭转力矩与转动惯量比值的量。

sentences.english: To improve the brix to acid ratio in VECO will not decrease its effects on soberness.
sentences.chinese: 而且提高金葛露糖酸比值不会影响其解酒效果。

sentences.english: The quotient of the first term and the last term is called the ratio.
sentences.chinese: 比的前项除以后项所得的商，叫做比值。

sentences.english: Of a source. Quotient of the luminous flux emitted and the power consumed.
sentences.chinese: 某一光源发出的光通量与其消耗功率的比值。

sentences.english: The intelligence quotient measures the ratio of a person's intellectual age to his chronological age.
sentences.chinese: 智商，是一个人的智力年龄和实际年龄的比值。

sentences.english: The ratio of chlorogenic acid to rutin in tobacco of South Africa is the lowest.
sentences.chinese: 南非烤烟绿原酸和芸香苷含量的比值最低。

sentences.english: In the production of alumina, the caustic ratio is the main production index in today's alumina industries.
sentences.chinese: 苛性比值是氧化铝生产过程中一个重要的生产指标。

sentences.english: The ratio of voltage to cardiac mass was decreased.
sentences.chinese: 心肌电压和心肌团块比值下降。

sentences.english: So that's a very wide sort of ratio there.
sentences.chinese: 我们能得到许许多多不同比值的重复。

sentences.english: This is the ratio of the focal length of the telescope to its aperture.
sentences.chinese: 这是指望远镜的焦距与其孔径的比值。

sentences.english: It does not require irrotational conditions and the limitation of the ratio of wave length to water depth.
sentences.chinese: 它没有无旋条件，没有波高对水深比值的限制。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish ratio spectrophotometry for determination of chloramphenicol and salicylic acid in tincture.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立氯柳酊中氯霉素和水杨酸的比值光谱测定法。

sentences.english: Enzyme activities were represented by the concentration ratio of metabolites to probe drugs.
sentences.chinese: 用代谢产物与母药比值来表达酶的活性。

sentences.english: Higher S-phase percent at pretreatment predicted higher remission rate and longer survival duration.
sentences.chinese: 期比值高缓解率高且总体生存期长。
